name: Soul Servant
effectText: Place 1 card on top of the Deck from your hand, Deck, or GY, that is "Dark Magician" or mentions "Dark Magician" or "Dark Magician Girl", except "Soul Servant". During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; draw cards equal to the number of "Palladium" monsters, "Dark Magician", and/or "Dark Magician Girl", with different names, on the field and in the GYs. You can only use this effect of "Soul Servant" once per turn.
